ModMetaData.name: Crafted Mutants v1.0.0
ModMetaData.author: PhileasFogg
ModMetaData.description:
Integrates extra features into RimWorld: - Installation of new bodyparts (third eye, more arms, supporting organ parts, etc.) - Harvesting and reintegrating of all available bodyparts and replacing with surrogates - Harvesting of mechanoid bodyparts for simple prosthetics
...and some things more...
Needs "Extended Human Body Simulation" above it in your mod list to work!
Credits and Thanks to... - Ykara, for his/her both fantastic mods, which I used as a basis, from which my small project started that (at first not intended) grew into this mod: "EPOE (Expanded Prosthetics and Organ Engineering)" and "Harvest Everything!" - Marnador, for the RimWor(l)d font. - Tynan, for this great game!
